packagegui.description: FreeSWITCH is an open source telephony platform designed to facilitate the creation of voice and chat driven products scaling from a soft-phone up to a soft-switch. It can be used as a simple switching engine, a PBX, a media gateway or a media server to host IVR applications using simple scripts or XML to control the callflow.

field.description: Enter the extension here. The default configuration expects extension numbers between 1001 -1019. To use additional numbers for the extensions by adjusting the dialplan. In the in the dialplan under name="Local_Extension" adjust the regular expression="^(10[01][0-9])$".
Enter the mailbox here. Example: extension 1001 then mailbox 1001
Enter the account code here. Example: extension 1001 then accountcode 1001
Enter the effective caller id name here.
Enter the effective caller id number here.
Enter the outbound caller id name here.
Enter the outbound caller id number here.
Optional: Enter the email address to send voicemail to.
Choose whether to attach the file to the email.
Enter the user context here. Example: default
Enter the description of the extension here.
